DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of pregabalin in pediatric patients, age 1 month through 16 years, with partial onset seizures.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Extension Study Of Safety And Tolerability Of Pregabalin In Pediatric Patients With Partial-Onset Seizures
DOC.criteria: Partial onset seizures, incompletely controlled on 13 medications At least 1 seizure per 28 days, on average Completion of study A0081074 Primary generalized seizures Progressive CNS pathology Failure to tolerate pregabalin in study A0081074
DOC.keyword: Partial-onset seizures; epilepsy; pediatric; pregabalin; 1 year extension study; safety; tolerability
